alert.note: Alert for Marquette (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 08 at 1:57PM EDT until July 08 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: The National Weather Service in Marquette has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Marquette County in north central Upper Michigan... * Until 245 PM EDT. * At 156 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Gwinn, or 21 miles southeast of Ishpeming, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Marquette County, including the following locations... Anderson Lake and McFarland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
